parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The ABS warning light comes on
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the brakes fail to stop the vehicle
the vehicle pulls to one side when braking
the brakes lock up
the vehicle skids or loses traction
the brakes make a thumping or grinding noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake master cylinder can cause the brake pedal to go to the floor, leading to a loss of braking power and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the brakes fail to stop the vehicle
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake rotor can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake rotor separates from its hub
the brake rotor is corroded
the brakes make a grinding or screeching noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering wheel tilt can cause the steering wheel to bounce up and down while driving, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel and column bounce up and down while driving
the bolts in the steering column come loose
the steering wheel tilt is loose and needs to be tightened.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idler arm can cause the vehicle to veer to one side, making it difficult to control, and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The idler arm falls apart
the vehicle veers to one side
the vehicle is hard to control
the idler arm needs to be replaced frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the tie rod end can cause the vehicle to shimmy, making it difficult to control, and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The tie rod ends loosen
the vehicle shimmies
the vehicle is hard to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seatbelt can cause injury to the occupant, including facial injuries.
symptoms: The shoulder strap fails
the occupant hits their face on the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driver's seat frame can cause the seat to severely lean or collapse, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities, especially in low-speed collisions.
symptoms: The driver's seat leans or collapses to one side
the seat back falls backward
the seat becomes loose or unstable
the seat track runners break or fail
the power adjusting seat mechanism fails.
